program main
   implicit none

   integer :: n
   character(len=3) :: first_result
   integer(8) :: cnt =0, tmp=0
   integer(8) :: position, result
   integer(8) :: nrstSeqStartIndx, startIndex

   character(len=100) :: modified_s  ! since the input is short, but can be handled.

   ! First part: read input and compute first_result
   read *, n
   character(len=n) :: strings(n)
   read(*, '(a)') strings(1:n)  ! Read each string as a line of length n.

   ! Process first program's logic
   character(len=1) :: a, b
   a = strings(1)(1:1)
   b = strings(1)(2:2)
   if (a == b) then
      first_result = "NO"
   else
      logical :: valid = .true.
      integer :: i, j
      do i = 1, n
         do j = 1, n
            if ( (i == j) .or. (i + j -1 == n) ) then
               if (strings(i)(j:j) /= a) then
                  valid = .false.
                  exit
               end if
            else
               if (strings(i)(j:j) /= b) then
                  valid = .false.
                  exit
               end if
            end if
         end do
         if (.not. valid) exit
      end do
      if (valid) then
         first_result = "YES"
      else
         first_result = "NO"
      end if
   end if

   ! Second part: process first_result to get cnt
   s = first_result
   modified_s = s  ! since no BC to replace
   do i = 1, len_trim(s)
      select case (modified_s(i:i))
      case ('A')
         tmp = tmp +1
      case ('D')
         cnt = cnt + tmp
      case default
         tmp = 0
      end select
   end do

   ! Third part: process cnt as position
   position = cnt
   nrstSeqStartIndx = 1
   do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx * 2) < position)
      nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx * 2
   end do
   do while (getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx +1) <= position)
      nrstSeqStartIndx = nrstSeqStartIndx +1
   end do
   startIndex = getValueAtIndex(nrstSeqStartIndx)
   result = position - startIndex +1

   print *, result

contains

   integer(8) function getValueAtIndex(k)
      integer(8), intent(in) :: k
      getValueAtIndex = 1 + (k-1)*k / 2
   end function getValueAtIndex

end program main
